tutors.name: Matthew Couture
tutors.title: B.S. in Applied Mathematics & Physics
tutors.bio: Former Division III track athlete with PhD in Applied Mathematics. Specializes in STEM subjects for student athletes. Dr. Chen understands the demanding schedule of competitive athletics and has developed unique teaching methods that work around training schedules.

testimonials.quote: Matt helped me master calculus while training 6 hours a day. His flexible scheduling saved my GPA!
